career.name: Amazon
career.title: Software Developer Engineer Intern
description: Designed and implemented an event-driven ETL pipeline using Kinesis Streams and AWS Lambda to persist datainto a DynamoDB table with Java and Dagger dependency injection
Implemented a React and Typescript frontend to allow 10,000+ users to search, sort, and filter through DynamoDB records with a lambda endpoint that returned paginated results
Achieved 100% code coverage for backend and frontend using Mockito, JUnit, and Vitest for automatic testing
Reduced data backfill time by 90% by developing a Python script to efficiently ingest CSV data into DynamoDB

career.name: Information Management Technologies
career.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed full-stack software solutions to streamline staffing and payroll processes for government agencies with 1500+ employees using Java, C#, Python, .NET, SQL Server, Javascript, HTML, CSS, and Visual Basic
Implemented web-mobile cross capability through 10+ RESTful API endpoints that interacted with SQL Server
Designed and implemented a C# automated mailing system using Gmail API that gathered real-time stock and cryptocurrency prices with YahooFinance, providing insight on upcoming changes with Grok
Implemented a full-stack app that allows users to input assets and view real-time updating value of their stock, cryptocurrency, metals

career.name: University of California, Irvine
career.title: Undergraduate Researcher
description: Supervised by Prof. Chen Li to develop full-stack application using Angular that runs genome sequence alignment
Increased efficiency of genome sequence alignment by over 800% through parallel computing with AWS clusters

Enabled 1,000+ users to have automatic AWS cluster creation, deletion, pausing, resuming, and file uploading to begin genome sequence alignment with an Angular frontend and backend of Scala and Go with Terraform
Enhanced user authentication with Google OAuth and Auth0, rerouting users and denying unauthorized API calls

career.name: Coding Minds Academy
career.title: Coding Instructor
description: Directed 60+ classes on fundamental topics of data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming
Achieved an average instructor rating of 94.6% by fostering an engaging and positive learning environment
